nodes.text: "The Incident, Part 2" is a  comic story that was published as the lead story of Star Wars Adventures 6. It was written by Katie Cook, illustrated by Cara McGee, and published by IDW Publishing on July 7, 2021.
Anakin Skywalker is depicted with two flesh hands; however, his right arm was replaced with a mechno-arm at the beginning of the Clone Wars, and he did not cover it with synthskin.
